title: Audio [IAB-3692]: Verify that an Audio Help button is visible if the 'audioHelpURL' is set inside of the config file
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND the 'audioHelpURL' has been set inside of the configuration file

XML: http://wapqa.mlb.com/atbat/config/5.2.0 (Example)
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the 'Scoreboard'
AND we tap on the Audio UI button
custom_expected: THEN we will see the Audio Help button

title: Audio [IAB-4399]: Verify that the Audio label inside of the Audio UI properly displays as: [Team A] vs. [Team B]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the Audio UI button
AND we start up an Audio Stream
custom_expected:
THEN the Audio label will read as: [Team A] vs. [Team B]
AND the lock screen will show [Team A] vs. [Team B] when the device is locked

title: Audio [IAB-4461]: Verify that if Audio is playing that there is an image on the lock screen alerting us of such
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up an Audio Stream
AND we lock our Mobile Device
AND we look at the Lock Screen
custom_expected: THEN we will see an image alerting us that the Audio is playing from At Bat

title: Audio [IAB-4492]: Verify that attempting to play any feed in the Audio UI doesn't result in a crash
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we tap on the Audio UI button
AND we tap on a random feed
custom_expected:
THEN the feed will begin to play successfully
AND the application will not crash

title: Gameday [IAB-2997]: Verify that the "Wrap" appears correctly at the end of a game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we are on Gameday
AND we watch a game to completion
OR we string a game to just before completion
AND we leave Gameday visible
OR we lock our mobile device
AND we look at our mobile device
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the 'Final' state is reflected correctly on the 'Wrap' screen

title: Gameday [IAB-4106]: Verify that when a game has been completed early that it's displayed as 'Final/n'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN a game has been 'Completed Early'
AND we navigate to Gameday for that specific game
custom_expected: THEN we will see the game status as 'Final/n' instead of mentioning 'Completed Early'

title: Gameday [IAB-4193]: Verify that tapping the current Pitcher and Batter doesn't cause a crash
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND we tap on the Pitcher
AND we tap on the Batter at the same time
custom_expected: THEN the Application will not crash

title: Gameday: Video Highlights [IAB-4097]: Verify that when we watch a Video Highlight and an Alert appears on top of it without any interaction that the application doesn't crash 30 seconds later
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND we start up a Video Highlight
AND we receive an Alert while the Video Highlight is playing
AND we leave the Alert there for at least 30 seconds
custom_expected: THEN the Application will not crash

title: MLB.TV [IAB-3485]: Verify that the Video Player will successfully start up at the Live part of the game consistently
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we have an MLB.TV Stream that is LIVE
AND we start up this particular stream
custom_expected: THEN it will successfully begin at the Live part of the game consistently

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4014] - Verify on a fresh install with no account information stored if we go to a Team Page and select the MLB.TV icon that when we get into the Video Player that it isn't disoriented
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have just freshly installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing the Lite version of the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we go to a Teams Home Page
AND that Teams Home Page has an MLB.TV Stream available
AND we tap on that MLB.TV Stream
AND we encounter the Paywall
AND we enter a valid account to get past the Paywall
custom_expected:
THEN the Video Player will open up
AND the Video Player will not have the UI buttons in the center of the screen

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4420]: Verify that an App Entitled user who is watching a 'Free Game of the Day' and attempts to access a Paid Feed through MLB.TV is hit with a Paywall
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing an App Entitled Account
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up a 'Free Game of the Day'
AND we attempt to access a paid feed through the MLB.TV interface
custom_expected: THEN we will encounter a Paywall

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4360]: Verify that we do not encounter an 'Access Issue' when trying to access the 'Free Game of the Day' for the first time through the Paywall Subscriber Login
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we aren't logged in as an Entitled MLB.TV user
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on a 'Free Game of the Day' link
AND we log in with the credentials of: (mlbtvtest+7@gmail.com / tester)
custom_expected: THEN we will not have any issues accessing the 'Free Game of the Day' feed

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4447]: Verify that we can successfully see in-game commercial scores
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up an MLB.TV Stream
AND there are in-game commercials available
custom_expected:
THEN we are able to see the transition to the in-game commercials successfully
AND we are able to see the in-game commercials transition back to the game successfully

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4106]: Verify that when a game has been completed early that it's displayed as 'Final/n'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND there is a game available that has been 'Completed Early'
custom_expected: THEN the game that has been 'Completed Early' will read as 'Final/n' instead of mentioning 'Completed Early'

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4116]: Verify that if we hit the Audio button on a Game Tile then that games Audio will begin to play
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the 'Scoreboard'
AND we tap on an active 'Game Tile'
AND we tap on the 'Audio' button
custom_expected: THEN that games Audio Stream will successfully start up

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4325]: Verify that we can swipe between days on the Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we attempt to swipe left
OR we attempt to swipe right
custom_expected: THEN we will be able to swipe successfully to another day

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4340]: Verify that the Scoreboard will not refresh to the current day when the user is on another day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to another day on the Scoreboard
AND we select the Video Tab from a completed game
AND we start up an Archived Game
AND we close the Archived Game down
AND we move back to the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
THEN we will remain on the appropriate day on the Scoreboard
AND we will not be reset to 'Today'

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4451]: Verify that we can access the Box Score on a finalized game as a Lite user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing the Application in Lite Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we tap on a completed game's Box Score icon
custom_expected: THEN the Box Score will successfully open

title: Settings [IAB-3766]: Verify if we have a Favorite Team set and we go to the Settings page for that Favorite Team that we'll see an 'Add to Homescreen' option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to 'More'
AND we tap on 'Settings'
AND we tap on 'Favorite Teams'
AND we add a 'Favorite Team'
AND we go to the 'Favorite Teams' page
AND we tap on the 'Gear'
custom_expected: THEN we will see the option of 'Add to Homescreen' available

title: Settings [IAB-3766]: Verify if we tap on the 'Add to Homescreen' option for our Favorite Team that Safari launches and allows the user to select a custom icon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have a Favorite Team set
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the 'Gear' on a Favorite Team
AND we tap on the 'Add to Home Screen' option
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that Safari launches
AND we will see that the user is allowed to select a custom icon

title: Settings [IAB-4157]: Verify that if we tap on the 'Screen Auto-Lock' cell that it doesn't highlight blue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on 'More'
AND we tap on 'Settings'
AND we tap on the 'Screen Auto-Lock' cell
custom_expected: THEN the 'Screen Auto-Lock' cell will NOT be highlighted in blue

title: Settings [IAB-4424]: Verify that adding or removing a Favorite Team doesn't cause the icons to flicker on the 'More' section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the 'More' section
AND we tap on 'Settings'
AND we tap on 'Favorite Teams'
AND we add a 'Favorite Team'
OR we remove a 'Favorite Team'
AND we back out to the 'More' section
custom_expected:
THEN the MLB.com Shop icon will not flicker
AND the Help icon will not flicker

title: DISH Sponsorship [IAB-4252]: Verify when we tap on an MLB.TV stream and login with a Dish Network + MLB.TV basic account that we are able to start the stream successfully
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have not logged in with an entitled account
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have 'Continued to Lite'
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to an MLB.TV Stream
AND the Paywall appears
AND we choose to 'Log In'
AND we log in with (mlbtvtest+9@gmail.com / tester)
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV Stream should start

title: Sponsorship & Banners [IAB-4310]: Verify we have the ability to target Ad Marvel ads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to News
AND we target ads to the feature of Lite
OR we target ads to the feature of At Bat
OR we target ads to the feature of Premium
OR we target ads to the feature of Dish
OR we target ads to the feature of Trial
custom_expected: THEN we are able to successfully target specific ads to each of the feature types

title: Stats Leader [IAB-4438]: Verify that a Lite user can successfully access the Stats Leader view without encountering a Paywall
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing the Application in Lite Mode
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to 'More'
AND we tap on 'Stats Leaders'
custom_expected:
THEN we are able to successfully access the Stats Leaders view
AND we will not encounter a Paywall

title: Teams [IAB-4106]: Verify that when a game has been completed early that it's displayed as 'Final/n'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to a Team Home Page that has finished a game in the state of 'Completed Early'
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the game reflects as 'Final/n' instead of 'Completed Early'

title: Teams [IAB-4401]: Verify that the Team Colors on the schedule page match their teams appropriately
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the various Team Pages
AND we open up the Schedule & Results menu
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the Team Colors on the schedule pages matchup to their teams appropriately.

title: Teams: Roster [IAB-4166]: Verify if we go to the Stats page on a Player Card and tap on a year that we aren't brought to the WAP Site
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on 'More'
AND we tap on 'Teams'
AND we tap on a Team
AND we tap on 'Roster'
AND we tap on a player's name
AND we tap on the 'Stats' tab
AND we tap on hyperlinked year
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT be brought to the WAP Site

title: Accessibility [IAB-4146]: Verify that with Accessibility turned on that we can successfully tap on the Box Score's in an MLB.TV feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have enabled the devices Accessibility options
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up an MLB.TV Stream
AND we tap on any part of the Scoreboard at the top
custom_expected:
THEN the application will continue to function normally
AND the application will not crash

title: Accessibility [IAB-4287]: Verify that the Paywall Carousel supports accessibility correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have enabled the Accessibility options
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the MLB.com menu
AND we tap on the Buy At Bat option
AND we encounter the Paywall
AND we tap on the Carousel
custom_expected: THEN the Carousel will successfully support Accessibility correctly

title: Audio [IAB-3692]: Verify that an Audio Help button is visible if the 'audioHelpURL' is set inside of the config file
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat 
AND we have launched the Application 
AND the 'audioHelpURL' has been set inside of the configuration file

XML: http://wapqa.mlb.com/atbat/config/5.2.0 (Example)
custom_steps: WHEN we tap on the Audio UI button
custom_expected: THEN we will see the Audio Help button

title: Gameday [IAB-3395]: Verify that if a Pitch Out or Intentional Pitch is thrown outside the box that the pitch trail doesn't break
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND a Pitch Out has occurred
OR an Intentional Pitch has occurred
AND the pitches have been thrown way outside the box
custom_expected: THEN the pitch trail will not break on the pitches

title: Gameday [IAB-4106]: Verify that when a game has been completed early that it's displayed as 'Final/n'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND we look at the Out of Town Scoreboard
AND there is a game that has been 'Completed Early'
custom_expected: THEN we will see that game reflect as 'Final/n' instead of mentioning 'Completed Early'

title: Gameday [IAB-4227]: Verify that "No Scheduled Games" doesn't appear on a day with "Games"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we open up Gameday initially
AND there are no games being played
AND we tap on the 'Date Picker'
AND we select a day that has games
custom_expected: THEN we will see that 'No Scheduled Games' doesn't appear on a day with games

title: Gameday [IAB-4246]: Verify if we are on Gameday when it's in a 'Warmup' state that the Matchup header properly updates when the game moves into the first
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday for a game currently in the state of 'Warmup'
AND the game goes 'Live'
custom_expected:
THEN the Matchup header will properly update to reflect the inning that we're now in
AND the Matchup header will no longer read as 'Warmup'

title: Gameday [IAB-4435]: Verify on Wrap that a default caption of the game score will appear if none is set
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND there is a completed game available
AND we tap on the completed game
AND the wrap isn't using a caption
custom_expected: THEN a default caption of the game score will be present on the image

title: Scenario [IAB-3945]: Verify that the In-App Purchase screen doesn't take a long time to display on an EDGE/1X Network
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND the user is utilizing an At Bat entitled account
AND the user isn't entitled to MLB.TV
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts up an MLB.TV Stream
AND the user is utilizing a poor network connection
custom_expected: THEN the Paywall will appear in a timely manner

title: Scenario [IAB-4400]: Verify that when we tap on the Features part of the Paywall that we only see the following features: iPhone + iPad, Scoreboard, Live Radio, Gameday, Live Video & In-Game Highlights
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Features part of the Paywall
AND we tap on that part of the Paywall
custom_expected:
THEN we will only see the following items: iPhone + iPad, Scoreboard, Live Radio, Gameday, Live Video & In-Game Highlights
AND we will not see any mention of Stats anywhere

title: Live Look-In [IAB-4428]: Verify that the Live Look-In button doesn't appear clipped
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN a Live Look-In button is available
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Live Look-In button looks fine
AND we will see that the Live Look-In button isn't cut off

title: Data Syncing [IAB-3395]: Verify that if a Pitch Out or Intentional Pitch is thrown outside the box that the pitch trail doesn't break
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up an MLB.TV Stream
AND we have Data Syncing enabled
AND there is a Pitch Out
OR there is an Intentional Pitch
AND the pitch is thrown way outside the box
custom_expected:
THEN the pitch trail will not break
AND the pitch trail will look fine

title: Data Syncing [IAB-3837]: Verify  that the overlays update correctly when moving the scrubber around
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we have an Archive Game playing 
AND we have located a commercial break 
AND we have recorded the timing 
AND we allow an at bat or two to be fully completed 
AND we click the "Previous 30" button the appropriate amount of times to put us back into the commercial break 
OR we click the "Forward" button the appropriate amount of times to put us into the commercial break 
OR we pull the "Scrubber" to the commercial break
custom_expected: THEN the overlay will continue to work correctly

title: MLB.TV [IAB-3455]: Verify that the Video overlays update properly on iPad
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND Data Syncing has been enabled
custom_steps:
WHEN we are watching an MLB.TV Stream
AND we switch between games
custom_expected:
THEN the Video Overlays update properly
AND the Video Overlays do not go blank after multiple attempts against multiple games

title: MLB.TV [IAB-3485]: Verify that the Video Player will successfully start up at the Live part of the game consistently
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we have an MLB.TV Stream that is LIVE
AND we start up this particular stream
custom_expected: THEN it will successfully begin at the Live part of the game consistently

AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch and MLB.TV Stream
AND we tap on the button in the top right corner of the video controls overlay to stretch/shrink the video
AND we double tap the video a few times
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the video doesn't get stuck in a stretched out mode

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4351]: Verify that in-game delays appear correctly on the Scoreboard overlay inside of MLB.TV
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up an MLB.TV Stream
AND there is a game on the Scoreboard that has an in-game delay
custom_expected: THEN the in-game delay will reflect correctly on the MLB.TV Scoreboard

GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we aren't logged in as an Entitled MLB.TV user
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on a 'Free Game of the Day' link
AND we log in with the credentials of: (mlbtvtest+7@gmail.com / tester)
custom_expected: THEN we will not have any issues accessing the 'Free Game of the Day' feed

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4420]: Verify that an App Entitled user who is watching a 'Free Game of the Day' and attempts to access a Paid Feed through MLB.TV is hit with a Paywall

AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing an App Entitled Account
custom_steps:

GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up an MLB.TV Stream
AND there are in-game commercials available
custom_expected:
THEN we are able to see the transition to the in-game commercials successfully

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4493]: Verify that a Dish User doesn't lose entitlement when trying to access a Paid Feed after a 'Free Game of the Day' Feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have logged in as mlbtvtest+7@gmail.com / tester (Dish User)
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the MLB.TV button
AND we tap on a 'Free Game of the Day' feed
AND we tap on the Feed Changer inside of MLB.TV
AND we tap on a Paid Feed (No 'Free Game of the Day')
AND we run into a 'Not Authorized' message
AND we tap on the 'Cancel' button to close out
AND we tap on the 'Done' button to dismiss the MLB.TV feed
custom_expected: THEN we will not encounter any messages regarding losing entitlement

title: News [IAB-4279]: Verify if the Home Screen is set to News and we remove our account while in Gameday that News loads successfully

WHEN we navigate to Settings
AND we tap on 'Home Screen'
AND we set the 'Home Screen' to 'News'
AND we navigate to Gameday
AND we remove our App Entitled Account
custom_expected:
THEN we will be removed from Gameday
AND we will be brought to News
AND the News view will load successfully

AND we have launched the Application 
AND we have navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps:

AND no unexpected behavior will occur

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4266]: Verify that the Game Tiles do not reset to the order that is listed inside of the scoreboard XML instead of utilizing the sorting rules

AND we have launched the Application

AND that the scoreboard doesn't briefly ignore the Sorting Order at any point
AND that the scoreboard doesn't reset to the order specified in the scoreboard_ipad.2011.xml

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4477]: Verify that when a game has been completed that the 'Wrap' screen displays as 'Wrap' and not 'Wrap Up'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we tap on a game that is in a finalized state
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the 'Wrap' screen displays as 'Wrap'
AND the 'Wrap' screen doesn't display as 'Wrap Up'

title: Settings [IAB-4358]: Verify that the bottom of the Splash Screen doesn't have a solid blue line appearing
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have installed At Bat
custom_steps: WHEN we launch the Application on all different configurations
custom_expected: THEN we will not see a blue line at the bottom of the splash screen (especially on a 3rd Gen iPod Touch)

title: Settings [IAB-4157]: Verify that if we tap on the 'Screen Auto-Lock' cell that it doesn't highlight blue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on 'Settings'
AND we tap on the 'Screen Auto-Lock' cell
custom_expected: THEN the 'Screen Auto-Lock' cell will NOT be highlighted in blue

title: DISH Sponsorship [IAB-4252]: Verify when we tap on an MLB.TV stream and login with a Dish Network + MLB.TV basic account that we are able to start the stream successfully
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have not logged in with an entitled account
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have 'Continued to Lite'
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to an MLB.TV Stream
AND the Paywall appears
AND we choose to 'Log In'
AND we log in with (mlbtvtest+9@gmail.com / tester)
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV Stream should start

title: Sponsorship & Banners [IAB-4310]: Verify we have the ability to target Ad Marvel ads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to News
AND we target ads to the feature of Lite
OR we target ads to the feature of At Bat
OR we target ads to the feature of Premium
OR we target ads to the feature of Dish
OR we target ads to the feature of Trial
custom_expected: THEN we are able to successfully target specific ads to each of the feature types
